MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA19 postcode of Maybole. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am to remove a tree from the overhead lines near to Kirkbridge Lodge and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.38am on Monday 26th October 2020.
